short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab Chrome extension with dynamic Manga Art backgrounds & an integrated search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore a diverse range of manga series through the changing backgrounds on every new tab. Get a glimpse of various genres, including action, romance, fantasy, adventure, and more, and discover new manga titles to dive into.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Manga Art extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://mangart-tab.com/tos and Privacy Policy https://mangart-tab.com/privacy

Install now and unlock a visually captivating and immersive browsing experience dedicated to manga enthusiasts!

Note: Manga Art's new tab extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal information.
